spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The dragon's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 17}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The dragon can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The dragon can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and can choose to leave a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes two melee attacks, one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) thunder damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Debilitating Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales a pulse of high-pitched, nearly inaudible sound in a 60-foot-cone. Each creature in that cone must make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 45 ({@damage 13d6}) thunder damage and is {@condition incapacitated} until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: The dragon makes a tail attack.

legendary.name: Telekinetic Fling
entries: The dragon chooses a Small or smaller object that isn't being worn or carried that it can see within 60 feet of it, and magically hurls the object at a creature it can see within 60 feet of the object. The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or take 15 ({@damage 4d6}) bludgeoning damage.

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon magically teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet of it.
